title: Level 23 ingame but cant post on boards?
body: Help? says im still level 4 this has been for months

replies.body: Every once and awhile someone's Boards account doesn't get correctly synced up with their Summoner Level. Either posting here in H&S or using the Profile Syncing Tool stickied at the top will push a sync through. You're showing up as level 23 for me now.
